reviewText: My husband and I gave this to my nephew last Christmas as he is a loyal Cardinal's fan. So is my brother; He wanted to take it home with him instead... :)
My dad (the Cardinals fan) watched this.  He liked it, but said that some of the narrators did not have good voices.
Purchased this as a gift, and they loved it!
The earlier years were, naturally a little weak but the latter years were very  entertaining!!
IT WAS AWESOME! I have watched it twice and learned new things second time around. I would recommend it for any St Louis Cardinals fan.
This was a good collection of World Series films...Mostly centered on the more recent championships but any Cardinals fan will enjoy this !

How great is it to see some of these old games, or at least a portion of them (as they only have highlights for the oldest of the games and nothing from the 1930's)
Definitely recommended for any fan of old time baseball and/or a Cardinal fan.
Just wished that had a closed caption option, I'd love to show these to my Grandparents, who are in their mid 90's and actually saw some of these games, but they can't hear the TV.
I'm a STL Cardinal fan and love seeing the footage of years past.
Bought for a friend, him and his wife love the Cardinals
